content.query:
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
--- We are just transforming table/view to select only the columns we need

USE woca_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.Individual') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Individual
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Individual
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/Individual',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
--SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_Individual;
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO



SELECT * FROM silver.Individual;

--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.individual;
